name: Trap Master: Merge Defense
description:
Villains are rushing into the cave to steal the treasure!
Set up traps to punish the villains!

▶ Game Features
[Unique Traps]
Set up traps that can fling, push, or stun your enemies!
Lock up villains between walls and melt them with flamethrowers!

[Interesting Strategies]
Tactically select from randomized skills!
Strategically set up traps to successfully clear the stage!

[Exciting Combinations]
Combine the same traps to create stronger ones!
Defeat villains by combining various traps and skills!

[Breathtaking Tension]
Stop the villains from stealing the jewels!
Eliminate the villains running away with the jewels!

◇ Notes
Trap Master is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases.
You can turn off in-app purchases in your device settings.
